pullRequest.title: Fixes project > "Add User Group" button displayed to collaborators.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of changes
Add user groups button should not be displayed to all users.
Related issue
N/A
Checklist
Things for the developer to confirm they've done before the PR should be accepted:
* [ ] CHANGELOG.md (and UPGRADING.md if necessary) updated with information for new change.

 Tests added (or description of how to test) for any new features.
* [ ] User documentation updated for UI or technical changes.

commit.message: :white_check_mark: Fixes issues with add user group button displayed to collaborators

nodes.bodyText: I think it would be better to return if the size == 1 instead of size > 0. Ensures that there is only one button displayed.

commit.message: :white_check_mark: Making sure there is ever only one add user group button.
